messages.text: Nutrition security is a state of having access to sufficient, safe and nutritious food that meets dietary needs for an active and healthy life. It also includes the ability to make informed choices about what one eats.
What is the primary benefit of prescribed fire in forest management, as studied by the Grandfather Restoration Project?

The primary benefit of prescribed fire in forest management, as studied by the Grandfather Restoration Project, is to reduce fuel loads and prevent catastrophic wildfires. Prescribed fires are carefully planned and executed burns that mimic natural wildfire patterns, allowing for controlled burning of vegetation while minimizing damage to surrounding areas.
